item.title: India Tourism Development Corporation Hits Intraday High with Strong Trading Momentum
item.description: India Tourism Development Corporation (ITDC) demonstrated robust intraday performance today, reaching a peak price of Rs 594.25, marking a 4.27% rise within the trading session. This surge outpaced the Hotels & Resorts sector and reflected notable trading activity amid a broadly subdued market environment. Time: 9 minutes ago

item.title: John Cockerill India Hits Intraday High with Strong 7.78% Surge
item.description: John Cockerill India demonstrated robust intraday performance on 26 Dec 2025, surging to an intraday high of Rs 5,100, reflecting a 7.78% gain. This movement outpaced the broader Sensex, which traded lower by 0.37%, signalling a notable divergence in market action within the industrial manufacturing sector. Time: 9 minutes ago
